1257740.name: Maelstrom - Undertow Bundle
1257740.description:
Upgrade Your Fleet

Upgrade your fleet with the new Undead Frigate Undertow and her terrifying Captain Greavus Leaguemoor.

Bundle Contents

  • Undead Frigate: 'Undertow'
  • Undead Captain: 'Greavus Leaguemoor'
  • 3 Undead Mates
  • 'Revenant' Skin

Undead Passive

Siphon: Undead ships have lower Armor values, but compensate by using a siphon effect where their armor repairs automatically by dealing cannon damage. This means extended engagements tend to favor the Undead.

Ship Passive

Soul Tempest: When sinking a ship, gain a slow moving ghost that sails around the ship. If the ghost collides with an enemy, they take damage.

Ship Tier X

Cursed Cannons: When this ship deals cannon damage, the enemy cannons of the quadrant damaged are temporarily disabled.

New Captain: Greavus Leaguemoor


Greavus Leaguemoor's Barrier of Bone
Greavus hurls a bone harpoon, summoning a barrier of bones around whatever it hits.
1257740.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
